nodes.text: Portug was a planet located in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy. The Tusken Raider KkH'Oar'Rrhr and his followers once visited this planet in search of his revered leader A'sharad Hett, after his exile from Tatooine.

Portug was mentioned in part 2 of the blog Barely Tolerable: Alien Henchmen of the Empire, and was included as a reference to the (at the time) ongoing discussion of whether the Portuguese man-o'-war was a truly valid entry to Wookieepedia.
